entry.value: library(Peptides)%%00010df <- knime.in%%00010%%00010# new functions for amino acid composition%%00010## checks if all characters are AA characters%%00010aaCheck <- function(seq){%%00010 if(!any(lengths(seq) > 1)){%%00010 seq <- toupper(seq)%%00010 seq <- gsub(pattern = "[[:space:]]+",replacement = "",x = seq)%%00010 seq <- strsplit(x = seq,split = "")%%00010 } else {%%00010 seq <- lapply(seq,toupper)%%00010 }%%00010 check <- unlist(lapply(seq,function(sequence){%%00010 !all(sequence%in%c("A" ,"C" ,"D" ,"E" ,"F" ,"G" ,"H" ,"I" ,"K" ,"L" ,"M" ,"N" ,"P" ,"Q" ,"R" ,"S" ,"T" ,"V" ,"W" ,"Y", "-"))%%00010 }))%%00010 if(sum(check) > 0){%%00010 sapply(which(check == TRUE),function(sequence){warning(paste0("Sequence ",sequence," has unrecognized amino acid types. Output value might be wrong calculated"),call. = FALSE)})%%00010 }%%00010 return(seq)%%00010}%%00010%%00010## counts composition%%00010amino_acids <- function(seq){%%00010 # Remove space characters: tab, newline, vertical tab, form feed, carriage return, space and possibly other locale-dependent characters.%%00010 seq <- aaCheck(seq)%%00010 # Make a frequencies table%%00010 seq <- lapply(seq, function(seq){table(unlist(seq))})%%00010 # Applying composition function%%00010 aacomp <- lapply(seq, function(seq){%%00010 # Classify amino acids in a particular class and sum the absolute frequencies%%00010 nonpolar<-paste("nonpolar:",sum(seq[c("A","F","G","I","L","M","P","V","W")],na.rm = TRUE),sep="")%%00010 polar<-paste("polar:",sum(seq[c("B","C","N","Q","S","T","Y","Z")],na.rm = TRUE),sep="")%%00010 basic<-paste("basic:",sum(seq[c("H","K","R")],na.rm = TRUE),sep="")%%00010 acidic<-paste("acidic:",sum(seq[c("D","E")],na.rm = TRUE),sep="")%%00010 # Output string%%00010 output <- paste(nonpolar,polar,basic,acidic, sep=";")%%00010 return(output)%%00010 })%%00010 # Return output matrix rounded to 3 decimals%%00010 return(unlist(aacomp))%%00010}%%00010%%00010# only select AA column%%00010AA_list <- as.character(df[,1])%%00010%%00010# create parameters character vector%%00010parameters <- unlist(strsplit(knime.flow.in[["parameters"]], ","))%%00010%%00010# empty output df%%00010output <- list()%%00010%%00010# calculate selected parameters%%00010if("MW" %in% parameters){%%00010%%00009x <- mw(AA_list)%%00010%%00009output$MW <- x%%00010}%%00010%%00010if("GRAVY" %in% parameters){%%00010%%00009x <- hydrophobicity(AA_list)%%00010%%00009output$GRAVY <- x%%00010}%%00010%%00010if("pI" %in% parameters){%%00010%%00009x <- pI(AA_list)%%00010%%00009output$pI <- x%%00010}%%00010%%00010if("AA count" %in% parameters){%%00010%%00009x <- nchar(AA_list)%%00010%%00009output$AA_count <- x%%00010}%%00010%%00010if("AA composition" %in% parameters){%%00010%%00009x <- amino_acids(AA_list)%%00010%%00009output$AA_composition <- x%%00010}%%00010%%00010output_df <- do.call(cbind, output)%%00010output_df <- as.data.frame(output_df)%%00010%%00010rownames(output_df) <- rownames(df)%%00010%%00010knime.out <- output_df

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
